trans-unit.source: Provides information about a property of a type that components can access across application domain and process boundaries.

The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> structure provides information about a property of an object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
Represents the attributes of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes.
The value of this field is <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyAttributes.None> if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> describes a property of a COM object.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes a readable property.
The value of this field is `true` if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> describes a readable property; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes a writable property.
The value of this field is `true` if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> describes a writeable property; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
Represents the index parameters for the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes.
Represents member data for the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes.
The member data includes the name of the property and the type that declares the property.
Represents the type of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> describes.
